// Utilitary functions for the MainPage component and inner components
import Alerts from"../../utils/Alerts/sa-alerts";export function showGameJoinMessage(game_id,navigate){return Alerts.showMessage("Game Created","You can now join by clicking on the button below",{joinGame:{text:'Join',className:'join-game-btn',visible:true}},[{className:"join-game-btn",eventName:"click",execute:function execute(){navigate("/games/".concat(game_id));}}]);}var MainPageUtils={showGameJoinMessage:showGameJoinMessage};export default MainPageUtils;
